archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Data Architecture
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Data Architecture (Cross-layer)
Components:
• Data Entity (Data Object) • Logical Data (Data Component) • Physical Data (Artifact) • Data Flow (Data Flow)
Examples:
• Data Entity: Patient Record • Logical Data: Clinical Notes • Physical Data: Encrypted MRI scan file • Data Flow: Transfer of vitals from bedside device to EHR
